FunctionValue.Expression: select ("BusinessRoles" as area, translate("#LDS#Heading Business Roles") as caption)
select ("BusinessRoles" as area, translate('#LDS#You are responsible for the following business roles.') as caption)

Container.Condition: Area() = 'BusinessRoles' and ispreprop("ORG") and exists("Person", variable("uid_person = '%useruid%' and uid_person in ( select piae.uid_person from personinaerole piae join AERoleCollection aec on aec.UID_AERole = piae.uid_aerole where aec.UID_ParentAERole = 'RMB-AEROLE-ROLEADMIN-ADMIN')"))

Label.Text: translate("#LDS#This page shows business roles you are directly responsible for. To view all business roles, click here.")
